plays.text: Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Kris Draper
Penalty to Scott Stevens 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Fredrik Olausson 2 minutes for High Sticking Sergei Brylin
Penalty to Ken Daneyko 2 minutes for Interference Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Steve Yzerman and Sergei Fedorov
Goal scored by Colin White assisted by Bobby Holik and Sergei Nemchinov
Goal scored by Boyd Devereaux assisted by Igor Larionov and Fredrik Olausson
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for High Sticking John Madden
Goal scored by John Madden assisted by Randy McKay and Jay Pandolfo
Penalty to Darren McCarty 5 minutes for Fighting Colin White
Penalty to Colin White 5 minutes for Fighting Chris Chelios
Goal scored by Igor Larionov assisted by Luc Robitaille
Penalty to Randy McKay 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Manny Legace
